verses.verse: In <S%H1992>those<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> there was <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> and in <S%H1992>those<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> the <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1839>Danites<s%> <S%H1245>sought<s%> them an <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> to <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in; for to that <S%H3117>day<s%> all their <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> had not <S%H5307>fallen<s%> to them <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> of their <S%H4940>family<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H1121><s%> from their <S%H7098>coasts,<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H2428>valor,<s%> from <S%H6881>Zorah,<s%> and from <S%H847>Eshtaol,<s%> to <S%H7270>spy<s%> out the <S%H776>land,<s%> and to <S%H2713>search<s%> it; and they <S%H559>said<s%> to them, <S%H3212>Go,<s%> <S%H2713>search<s%> the <S%H776>land:<s%> who when they <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H4318>Micah,<s%> they <S%H3885>lodged<s%> <S%H8033>there.<s%>

When they were by the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H4318>Micah,<s%> they <S%H5234>knew<s%> the <S%H663>voice<s%> of the <S%H5288>young<s%> man the <S%H3881>Levite:<s%> and they <S%H5493>turned<s%> in <S%H8033>thither,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H4310>Who<s%> <S%H935>brought<s%> you <S%H1988>here?<s%> and <S%H4100>what<s%> <S%H6213>make<s%> you in <S%H6311>this<s%> place? and <S%H4100>what<s%> have you <S%H6311>here?<s%>
And he <S%H559>said<s%> to them, <S%H2090>Thus<s%> and <S%H2088>thus<s%> <S%H6213>deals<s%> <S%H4318>Micah<s%> with me, and has <S%H7936>hired<s%> me, and I am his <S%H3548>priest.<s%>

And they <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H7592>Ask<s%> counsel, we <S%H4994>pray<s%> you, of <S%H430>God,<s%> that we may <S%H3045>know<s%> whether our <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> we <S%H1980>go<s%> shall be <S%H6743>prosperous.<s%>

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to them, <S%H3212>Go<s%> in <S%H7965>peace:<s%> <S%H5227>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is your <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H834>wherein<s%> you <S%H3212>go.<s%>

Then the <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H3212>departed,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H3919>Laish,<s%> and <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> that were <S%H7130>therein,<s%> how they <S%H3427>dwelled<s%> <S%H983>careless,<s%> after the <S%H4941>manner<s%> of the <S%H6722>Zidonians,<s%> <S%H8252>quiet<s%> and <S%H982>secure;<s%> and there was <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H3423>magistrate<s%> <S%H6114><s%> in the <S%H776>land,<s%> that might <S%H3637>put<s%> them to <S%H3637>shame<s%> in any <S%H1697>thing;<s%> and they were <S%H7350>far<s%> from the <S%H6722>Zidonians,<s%> and had <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H1697>business<s%> with any <S%H120>man.<s%>
And they <S%H935>came<s%> to their <S%H251>brothers<s%> to <S%H6881>Zorah<s%> and <S%H847>Eshtaol:<s%> and their <S%H251>brothers<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to them, <S%H4100>What<s%> <S%H559>say<s%> you?

And they <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H6965>Arise,<s%> that we may <S%H5927>go<s%> up <S%H5921>against<s%> them: for we have <S%H7200>seen<s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> it is <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H2896>good:<s%> and are you <S%H2814>still?<s%> be not <S%H6101>slothful<s%> to <S%H3212>go,<s%> and to <S%H935>enter<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> the <S%H776>land.<s%>

When you <S%H935>go,<s%> you shall <S%H935>come<s%> to a <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H982>secure,<s%> and to a <S%H7342>large<s%> <S%H3027><s%> <S%H776>land:<s%> for <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H5414>given<s%> it into your <S%H3027>hands;<s%> a <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> there is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H4270>want<s%> of <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H1697>thing<s%> that is in the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

And there <S%H5265>went<s%> from <S%H8033>there<s%> of the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H1839>Danites,<s%> out of <S%H6881>Zorah<s%> and out of <S%H847>Eshtaol,<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H2296>appointed<s%> with <S%H3627>weapons<s%> of <S%H4421>war.<s%>

And they <S%H5927>went<s%> up, and <S%H2583>pitched<s%> in <S%H7157>Kirjathjearim,<s%> in <S%H3063>Judah:<s%> <S%H5921>why<s%> <S%H3651><s%> they <S%H7121>called<s%> that <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H4265>Mahanehdan<s%> to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day:<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> it is <S%H310>behind<s%> <S%H7157>Kirjathjearim.<s%>
And they <S%H5674>passed<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> to <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H4318>Micah.<s%>

Then <S%H6030>answered<s%> the <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> that <S%H1980>went<s%> to <S%H7270>spy<s%> out the <S%H776>country<s%> of <S%H3919>Laish,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to their <S%H251>brothers,<s%> Do you <S%H3045>know<s%> that there is in <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1004>houses<s%> an <S%H646>ephod,<s%> and <S%H8655>teraphim,<s%> and a <S%H6459>graven<s%> image, and a <S%H4541>molten<s%> image? <S%H6258>now<s%> therefore <S%H3045>consider<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> you have to <S%H6213>do.<s%>

And they <S%H5493>turned<s%> <S%H8033>thitherward,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H5288>young<s%> man the <S%H3881>Levite,<s%> even to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H4318>Micah,<s%> and <S%H7592>saluted<s%> <S%H7965><s%> him.

And the <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H2296>appointed<s%> with their <S%H3627>weapons<s%> of <S%H4421>war,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> were of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan,<s%> <S%H5324>stood<s%> by the <S%H6607>entering<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate.<s%>

And the <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> that <S%H1980>went<s%> to <S%H7270>spy<s%> out the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H5927>went<s%> up, and <S%H935>came<s%> in <S%H8033>thither,<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H6459>graven<s%> image, and the <S%H646>ephod,<s%> and the <S%H8655>teraphim,<s%> and the <S%H4541>molten<s%> image: and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H5324>stood<s%> in the <S%H6607>entering<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> with the <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> that were <S%H2296>appointed<s%> with <S%H3627>weapons<s%> of <S%H4421>war.<s%>

And <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H935>went<s%> into <S%H4318>Micah's<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H3947>fetched<s%> the <S%H6459>carved<s%> image, the <S%H646>ephod,<s%> and the <S%H8655>teraphim,<s%> and the <S%H4541>molten<s%> image. Then <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> to them, <S%H4100>What<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> you?

And they <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H2790>Hold<s%> your <S%H2790>peace,<s%> <S%H7760>lay<s%> your <S%H3027>hand<s%> on your <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> and <S%H3212>go<s%> with us, and be to us a <S%H1>father<s%> and a <S%H3548>priest:<s%> is it <S%H2896>better<s%> for you to be a <S%H3548>priest<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H376>man,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> that you be a <S%H3548>priest<s%> to a <S%H7626>tribe<s%> and a <S%H4940>family<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel?<s%>

And the <S%H3548>priest's<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%> was <S%H3190>glad,<s%> and he <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H646>ephod,<s%> and the <S%H8655>teraphim,<s%> and the <S%H6459>graven<s%> image, and <S%H935>went<s%> in the <S%H7130>middle<s%> of the <S%H5971>people.<s%>
So they <S%H6437>turned<s%> and <S%H3212>departed,<s%> and <S%H7760>put<s%> the <S%H2945>little<s%> ones and the <S%H4735>cattle<s%> and the <S%H3520>carriage<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> them.

And when they were a <S%H7368>good<s%> way from the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H4318>Micah,<s%> the <S%H582>men<s%> that were in the <S%H1004>houses<s%> <S%H5973>near<s%> to <S%H4318>Micah's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> were <S%H2199>gathered<s%> together, and <S%H1692>overtook<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan.<s%>

And they <S%H7121>cried<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan.<s%> And they <S%H5437>turned<s%> their <S%H6440>faces,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4318>Micah,<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> ails you, that you <S%H2199>come<s%> with such a <S%H2199>company?<s%>

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> You have <S%H3947>taken<s%> away my <S%H430>gods<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H6213>made,<s%> and the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> and you are <S%H3212>gone<s%> away: and <S%H4100>what<s%> have I <S%H5750>more?<s%> and <S%H4100>what<s%> is <S%H2088>this<s%> that you <S%H559>say<s%> to me, <S%H4100>What<s%> ails you?

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, Let not your <S%H6963>voice<s%> be <S%H8085>heard<s%> among us, <S%H6435>lest<s%> <S%H4751>angry<s%> <S%H5315><s%> <S%H582>fellows<s%> <S%H6293>run<s%> on you, and you <S%H622>lose<s%> your <S%H5315>life,<s%> with the <S%H5315>lives<s%> of your <S%H1004>household.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> their <S%H1870>way:<s%> and when <S%H4318>Micah<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that they were too <S%H2389>strong<s%> for him, he <S%H6437>turned<s%> and <S%H7725>went<s%> <S%H7725>back<s%> to his <S%H1004>house.<s%>

And they <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H1697>things<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H4318>Micah<s%> had <S%H6213>made,<s%> and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H1961>had,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H3919>Laish,<s%> to a <S%H5971>people<s%> that were at <S%H8252>quiet<s%> and <S%H982>secure:<s%> and they <S%H5221>smote<s%> them with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and <S%H8313>burnt<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> with <S%H784>fire.<s%>

And there was <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H5337>deliverer,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> it was <S%H7350>far<s%> from <S%H6721>Zidon,<s%> and they had <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H1697>business<s%> with any <S%H120>man;<s%> and it was in the <S%H6010>valley<s%> that lies by <S%H1050>Bethrehob.<s%> And they <S%H1129>built<s%> a <S%H5892>city,<s%> and <S%H3427>dwelled<s%> therein.

And they <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H1835>Dan,<s%> after the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan<s%> their <S%H1>father,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> was <S%H3205>born<s%> to <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> <S%H199>however,<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> was <S%H3919>Laish<s%> at the <S%H7223>first.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan<s%> <S%H6965>set<s%> up the <S%H6459>graven<s%> image: and <S%H3129>Jonathan,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1648>Gershom,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> he and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> were <S%H3548>priests<s%> to the <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H1546>captivity<s%> of the <S%H776>land.<s%>

And they <S%H7760>set<s%> them up <S%H4318>Micah's<s%> <S%H6459>graven<s%> image, <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H6213>made,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the time that the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> was in <S%H7887>Shiloh.<s%>
